AT.name: Parascientific Escape - Gear Detective
AT.description: 'Parascientific Escape～Gear Detective～' is a sequal to 'Parascientific Escape～Cruise in the distant seas～’, where the player is required to find clues and solve puzzles to escape certain situation using PSI abilities. The story follows Detective Kyosuke Ayana, who has the ability named chronokinesis which allows him to look back in time in a limited field of view, for up till 5 days back. Detective Ayana is hired to find a serial killer threatening the quiet neighborhood of Camellia Hills - but soon finds himself in much bigger trouble as he investigates the crime scenes.

AU.name: Parascientific Escape - Gear Detective

The story follows Detective Kyosuke Ayana, who has the ability named chronokinesis which allows him to look back in time in a limited field of view, for up till 5 days back. Detective Ayana is hired to find a serial killer threatening the quiet neighborhood of Camellia Hills - but soon finds himself in much bigger trouble as he investigates the crime scenes.

BE.name: Parascientific Escape - Gear Detective
BE.description: Parascientific Escape Gear Detective est une suite de Parascientific Escape Cruise in the distant seas, où le joueur doit trouver des indices et résoudre des puzzles afin d'échaper à certaines situations en utilisant les capacités PSI. L'histoire suit le Détective Kyosuke Ayana, qui a un don nommé chronokinésie, qui lui permet de voir dans le passé sur une certaine portée, jusqu'à 5 jours en arrière. Détective Ayana est engagée pour trouver un tueur en série menaçant le voisinage calme de Camellia Hills - mais se trouvera lui même en grand danger au fur et à mesure qu'il enquête les lieux de crime.
